trans-unit.source: Allows applications to send e-mail by using the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP).
trans-unit.target: Tillater at programmer kan sende e-post ved hjelp av e-post for SMTP Simple Transfer Protocol ().

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class by using configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> properties for the new <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> by using the settings in the application or machine configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A>egenskapene for den nye <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>ved hjelp av innstillingene i application eller maskinen konfigurasjonsfiler.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [\<mailSettings\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CmailSettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ \< mailSettings\> Elementet (nettverksinnstillinger)](../Topic/%3CmailSettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class that sends e-mail by using the specified SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> klassen sender e-post ved hjelp av den angitte SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name or IP address of the host computer used for SMTP transactions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på eller IP-adressen til vertsdatamaskinen brukes for SMTP-transaksjoner.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class that sends e-mail by using the specified SMTP server and port.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> klassen sender e-post ved hjelp av den angitte SMTP-serveren og porten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på eller IP-adressen til verten brukes for SMTP-transaksjoner.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> greater than zero that contains the port to be used on `host`.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>større enn null som inneholder porten som skal brukes på `host`.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: port cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: portkan ikke være mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Specify which certificates should be used to establish the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection.
trans-unit.target: Angi hvilke sertifikater som skal brukes til å koble Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

trans-unit.source: Client certificates are, by default, optional; however, the server configuration might require that the client present a valid certificate as part of the initial connection negotiation.
trans-unit.target: Klientsertifikater er som standard valgfritt. serverkonfigurasjonen kan imidlertid krever at klienten bruke et gyldig som en del av den første tilkobling forhandlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I Framework bufrer SSL-økter som de opprettes og prøver å bruke en bufret økt til en ny forespørsel om mulig.

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of ClientCertificates (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if ClientCertificates is empty.
trans-unit.target: Under forsøk på å bruke en SSL-økt, rammeverket bruker det første elementet i ClientCertificates (Hvis det finnes et), eller forsøker å bruke en anonym økter Hvis ClientCertificates er tom.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>, holding one or more client certificates.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>, inneholder ett eller flere klientsertifikater.

trans-unit.source: The default value is derived from the mail configuration attributes in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er avledet fra e-post konfigurasjonen attributter i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials used to authenticate the sender.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir legitimasjonen som brukes til å godkjenne avsenderen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.ICredentialsByHost> that represents the credentials to use for authentication; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no credentials have been specified.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.ICredentialsByHost>som representerer legitimasjonen som skal brukes for godkjenning; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen legitimasjon er angitt.</xref:System.Net.ICredentialsByHost>

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property when an email is being sent.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre verdien for denne egenskapen når sendes en e-post.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delivery format used by <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir levering formatet som brukes av <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> sende e-post.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryFormat"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The delivery format used by <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Levering formatet som brukes av <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how outgoing email messages will be handled.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan utgående e-post som blir behandlet meldinger.

trans-unit.source: Delivery methods include: - An SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Leveringsmetoder inkluderer:-et SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: - Moving the email into the pickup directory for IIS, which then delivers the message.
trans-unit.target: -Flytte e-postadressen til hentemappen for IIS, som leverer meldingen.

trans-unit.source: - Moving the email to a directory specified by <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A> for later delivery by another application.
trans-unit.target: -Flytte e-postmeldingen til en mappe som er angitt av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A>for senere levering av et annet program.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen kan også angis i en maskin eller programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Any changes made to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A> property override the configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A>egenskapen overstyrer filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.PickupDirectoryLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref> that indicates how email messages are delivered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"> </xref> som angir hvordan leveres e-postmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: Sends a QUIT message to the SMTP server, gracefully ends the TCP connection, and releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Sender en Avslutt melding til SMTP-serveren webområdet avsluttes TCP-tilkoblingen og frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The connection established by the current instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class to the SMTP server may be re-used if an application wishes to send multiple messages to the same SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Tilkobling av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klassen til SMTP-serveren kan brukes på nytt om et program som ønsker å sende flere meldinger til samme SMTP-serveren.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: This is particularly useful when authentication or encryption are used establish a connection to the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Dette er spesielt nyttig når godkjenning eller kryptering brukes kobler til SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: The process of authenticating and establishing a TLS session can be expensive operations.
trans-unit.target: Prosessen for godkjenning og oppretter en TLS-økt kan være omfattende operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A requirement to re-establish a connection for each message when sending a large quantity of email to the same SMTP server could have a significant impact on performance.
trans-unit.target: Et krav for å gjenopprette en tilkobling for hver melding under sending av et stort antall e-post til samme SMTP-serveren kan ha størst innvirkning på ytelsen.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of high-volume email applications that send email status updates, newsletter distributions, or email alerts.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere høyt volum e-postprogrammer som sende e-status, nyhetsbrev distribusjoner eller e-varsler.

trans-unit.source: Also many email client applications support an off-line mode where users can compose many email messages that are sent later when a connection to the SMTP server is established.
trans-unit.target: Mange e-post-klientprogrammer støtter også en frakoblet modus der brukere kan skrive mange e-postmeldinger som sendes senere når en tilkobling til SMTP-serveren er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: It is typical for an email client to send all SMTP messages to a specific SMTP server (provided by the Internet service provider) that then forwards this email to other SMTP servers.
trans-unit.target: Det er vanlig for e-postklient sende alle SMTP-meldinger til en bestemt SMTP-server (levert av Internett-leverandør) som videresender denne e-postadressen til andre SMTP-servere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class implementation pools SMTP connections so that it can avoid the overhead of re-establishing a connection for every message to the same server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>Klasseimplementering pools SMTP-tilkoblinger slik at den kan unngå overhead for å opprette en tilkobling for hver melding til den samme serveren på nytt.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: An application may re-use the same <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> object to send many different emails to the same SMTP server and to many different SMTP servers.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan bruke samme <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>objekt for å sende mange forskjellige e-post til samme SMTP-serveren og mange ulike SMTP-servere.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: As a result, there is no way to determine when an application is finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> object and it should be cleaned up.
trans-unit.target: Det er derfor ikke er mulig å finne ut når et program er ferdig med <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>objekt og skal ryddes. du</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: When an SMTP session is finished and the client wishes to terminate the connection, it must send a QUIT message to the server to indicate that it has no more messages to send.
trans-unit.target: Når en SMTP-økten er ferdig, og klienten ønsker å avslutte tilkoblingen, må den sende en melding Avslutt til serveren for å angi at den har ingen flere meldinger til å sende.

trans-unit.source: This allows the server to free up resources associated with the connection from the client and process the messages which were sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at serveren for å frigjøre ressurser som er knyttet til tilkoblingen fra klienten og behandle meldinger som ble sendt av klienten.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Dispose method on a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> object that is executing an asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> operation will cancel the send operation as though the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> method had been called.
trans-unit.target: Kall opp fjerningsmetoden i en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>objekt som kjører et asynkront <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>operasjonen avbrytes sendeoperasjonen som selv om den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A>har blitt kalt.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class has no `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klassen har ingen `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: So an application must call <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> to explicitly free up resources.
trans-unit.target: Slik at et program må kalle <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>eksplisitt frigjøre ressurser.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method iterates through all established connections to the SMTP server specified in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A> property and sends a QUIT message followed by gracefully ending the TCP connection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden går gjennom alle opprettede tilkoblinger til SMTP-serveren som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>egenskapen og sender en Avslutt melding etterfulgt av webområdet slutt TCP-tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method also releases the unmanaged resources used by the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden frigir også uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>metoden forlater den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>ble bruker.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ring alltid <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory.
trans-unit.target: Ellers vil ressurser den bruker ikke bli frigjort slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet.

trans-unit.source: Sends a QUIT message to the SMTP server, gracefully ends the TCP connection, releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> class, and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Sender en Avslutt melding til SMTP-serveren, webområdet avsluttes TCP-tilkoblingen, frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> klasse, og eventuelt disposes med administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The connection established by the current instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class to the SMTP server may be re-used if an application wishes to send multiple messages to the same SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Tilkobling av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klassen til SMTP-serveren kan brukes på nytt om et program som ønsker å sende flere meldinger til samme SMTP-serveren.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.target: Prosessen for godkjenning og oppretter en TLS-økt kan være omfattende operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>Når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>metoden forlater den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>ble bruker.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ring alltid <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory.
trans-unit.target: Ellers vil ressurser den bruker ikke bli frigjort slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to releases only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> til versjoner bare uforvaltet ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Specify whether the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.
trans-unit.target: Angi om den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> bruker SSL (Secure Sockets LAYER) til å kryptere tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: The EnableSsl property specifies whether SSL is used to access the specified SMTP mail server.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EnableSsl angir om SSL brukes til å få tilgang til den angitte SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen kan også angis i en maskin eller programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Any changes made to the EnableSsl property override the configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Endringer som gjøres i egenskapen EnableSsl overstyre filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class only supports the SMTP Service Extension for Secure SMTP over Transport Layer Security as defined in RFC 3207.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klassen støtter bare den SMTP-utvidelsen for sikker SMTP over Transport Layer Security som er definert i RFC 3207.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the SMTP session begins on an unencrypted channel, then a STARTTLS command is issued by the client to the server to switch to secure communication using SSL.
trans-unit.target: SMTP-økt starter på en ukryptert kanal i denne modusen, og en STARTTLS-kommando er sendt av klienten til serveren for å bytte til sikker kommunikasjon med SSL.

trans-unit.source: See RFC 3207 published by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se RFC 3207 som er publisert av tekniske Task Force (IETF Internet) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: An alternate connection method is where an SSL session is established up front before any protocol commands are sent.
trans-unit.target: En alternativ tilkoblingsmetode er der en SSL-økten er opprettet på forhånd før alle protokoller kommandoer sendes.

trans-unit.source: This connection method is sometimes called SMTP/SSL, SMTP over SSL, or SMTPS and by default uses port 465.
trans-unit.target: SMTP over SSL eller SMTPS, og som standard bruker porten 465 denne tilkoblingsmetoden kalles SMTP/SSL.

trans-unit.source: This alternate connection method using SSL is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden for alternativ servertilkobling bruker SSL støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.ClientCertificates%2A> to specify which client certificates should be used to establish the SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.ClientCertificates%2A>til å angi hvilken klientsertifikater som skal brukes til å opprette SSL-tilkobling.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.ClientCertificates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback%2A> allows you to reject the certificate provided by the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback%2A>gjør det mulig å avslå sertifikatet fra SMTP-serveren.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A> property allows you to specify the version of the SSL protocol to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A>egenskapen kan du angi hvilken versjon av SSL-protokollen som skal brukes.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the EnableSsl property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis egenskapen EnableSsl er satt til `true`, og SMTP-serveren ikke Presenter STARTTLS som svar på EHLO kommando, deretter et kall til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoder vil throw <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> uses SSL; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> bruker SSL; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på eller IP-adressen til verten brukes for SMTP-transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name or IP address of the computer to use for SMTP transactions.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på eller IP-adressen til datamaskinen for å bruke for SMTP-transaksjoner.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is equal to <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er lik <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> ("").

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property when an email is being sent.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre verdien for denne egenskapen når sendes en e-post.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class can override the OnSendCompleted method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klassen kan overstyre OnSendCompleted metode til å utføre flere aktiviteter når den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>inntreffer.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: OnSendCompleted also allows derived classes to handle <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSendCompleted gjør også avledede klasser til å håndtere <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>uten å knytte representant.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>i en avledet klasse.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the folder where applications save mail messages to be processed by the local SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir mappen der programmer lagre e-postmeldinger som kan behandles av den lokale SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: Mail messages in the pickup directory are automatically sent by a local SMTP server (if present), such as IIS.
trans-unit.target: E-postmeldinger i hentemappen sendes automatisk av en lokal SMTP-server (hvis aktuelt), for eksempel IIS.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen kan også angis i en maskin eller programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Any changes made to the PickupDirectoryLocation property override the configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Endringer som gjøres i egenskapen PickupDirectoryLocation overstyre filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the pickup directory for mail messages.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som angir hentemappen for e-postmeldinger.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the port used for SMTP transactions.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir porten som brukes for SMTP-transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Port property can also be set using constructors or the application or machine configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Port kan også angis ved hjelp av konstruktører eller application eller maskinen konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using configuration files, see [\<mailSettings\> Element (Network Settings)](../Topic/%3CmailSettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker konfigurasjonsfiler [ \< mailSettings\> Elementet (nettverksinnstillinger)](../Topic/%3CmailSettings%3E%20Element%20\(Network%20Settings\).md).

trans-unit.source: If information is specified using this property, this information overrides the configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Hvis informasjonen er angitt med denne egenskapen, overstyrer opplysningene filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that contains the port number on the SMTP host.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder portnummer på SMTP-verten.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 25.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon er mindre enn eller lik null.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property when an email is being sent.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre verdien for denne egenskapen når sendes en e-post.

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to an SMTP server for delivery.
trans-unit.target: Sender meldingen angitt til et SMTP-serveren for levering.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the e-mail is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer mens e-postmeldingen er sendt.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a time-out value using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A> property to ensure that the method returns after a specified amount of time elapses.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en tidsavbrudd verdi ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>til å sikre at metoden returnerer etter en viss tid går.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> properties must be set either through the configuration files by setting the relevant properties, or by passing this information into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A>Egenskaper må settes enten gjennom konfigurasjonsfilene ved å angi de relevante egenskapene eller ved å sende denne informasjonen til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method if there is a message being sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden hvis meldingen sendes asynkront.

trans-unit.source: If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SMTP-verten krever legitimasjon, må du konfigurere dem før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To specify credentials, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å angi legitimasjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception, check the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property to find the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>unntak, kontroll av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>til å finne årsaken operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>kan også inneholde en indre unntak som angir årsak operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: When sending e-mail using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> to multiple recipients and the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> sends e-mail to the accepted recipients and then a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Når du sender e-post ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>flere mottakere og SMTP serveren godtar noen mottakere som gyldig og avslår andre, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>sender e-post til mottakerne som er godkjent og deretter en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exception will contain a listing of the recipients that were rejected.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket inneholder en liste over mottakere ble avvist.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A> property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>er satt til `true`, og SMTP-serveren ikke Presenter STARTTLS som svar på EHLO kommando, deretter et kall til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoder vil throw <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailMessage"></xref> that contains the message to send.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailMessage"> </xref> som inneholder å sende meldingen.

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> has a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*> call in progress. -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.From%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- There are no recipients specified in <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties. -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod*> property is set to <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod*> property is set to <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*> is equal to the empty string (""). -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod*> property is set to <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port*> is zero, a negative number, or greater than 65,535.

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The connection to the SMTP server failed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen til SMTP-serveren mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: -or- Authentication failed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - godkjenning mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: -or- The operation timed out.
trans-unit.target: - eller - operasjonen ble tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> but the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod*> property is set to <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true," name="true," href=""> </xref> , men SMTP-serveren ikke Presenter STARTTLS som svar på kommandoen EHLO.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl*>

trans-unit.source: The message could not be delivered to one or more of the recipients in <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Den message kan ikke leveres til én eller flere mottakere i <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.To%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.CC%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Bcc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified e-mail message to an SMTP server for delivery.
trans-unit.target: Sender angitte e-postmeldingen til et SMTP-serveren for levering.

trans-unit.source: The message sender, recipients, subject, and message body are specified using <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den avsender mottakere, emne og meldingsteksten angis ved hjelp av <xref:System.String>objekter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the e-mail is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer mens e-postmeldingen er sendt.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a time-out value using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A> property to ensure that the method returns after a specified amount of time elapses.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en tidsavbrudd verdi ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>til å sikre at metoden returnerer etter en viss tid går.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> properties must be set either through the configuration files by setting the relevant properties, or by passing this information into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A>Egenskaper må settes enten gjennom konfigurasjonsfilene ved å angi de relevante egenskapene eller ved å sende denne informasjonen til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method if there is a message being sent asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle denne metoden hvis meldingen sendes asynkront.

trans-unit.source: If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SMTP-verten krever legitimasjon, må du konfigurere dem før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To specify credentials, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å angi legitimasjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception, check the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property to find the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>unntak, kontroll av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>til å finne årsaken operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>kan også inneholde en indre unntak som angir årsak operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: When sending e-mail using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> to multiple recipients and the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> sends e-mail to the accepted recipients and then a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Når du sender e-post ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>flere mottakere og SMTP serveren godtar noen mottakere som gyldig og avslår andre, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>sender e-post til mottakerne som er godkjent og deretter en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpFailedRecipientsException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exception will contain a listing of the recipients that were rejected.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket inneholder en liste over mottakere ble avvist.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A> property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified e-mail message to an SMTP server for delivery.
trans-unit.target: Sender angitte e-postmeldingen til et SMTP-serveren for levering.

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread and allows the caller to pass an object to the method that is invoked when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer ikke kall tråden, og gjør oppkalleren til å sende et objekt til metoden som aktiveres når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the e-mail has been sent or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Legg til en hendelsesbehandling til å bli varslet når e-postmeldingen er sendt eller operasjonen ble avbrutt, den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> operation by calling the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>operasjonen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>, you must wait for the e-mail transmission to complete before attempting to send another e-mail message using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Etter å <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>, må du vente på at e-overføringen skal fullføres før du prøver å en annen e-postmelding ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> must be set through the configuration files by setting the relevant properties, or by passing this information into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A>må angis via konfigurasjonsfilene ved å angi de relevante egenskapene eller ved å sende denne informasjonen til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SMTP-verten krever legitimasjon, må du konfigurere dem før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To specify credentials, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For å angi legitimasjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception, check the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property to find the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>unntak, kontroll av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>til å finne årsaken operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>kan også inneholde en indre unntak som angir årsak operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: When sending e-mail using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> to multiple recipients, if the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> is thrown with a <xref:System.NullReferenceException> for the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Når du sender e-post ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>til flere mottakere, hvis SMTP-serveren godtar noen mottakere som gyldig og avviser andre, en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>returnert med en <xref:System.NullReferenceException>for det interne unntaket.</xref:System.NullReferenceException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> fails to send e-mail to any of the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette skjer, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>kan ikke sende e-post til noen av mottakerne.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Your application can detect a server certificate validation error by examining the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property passed into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Programmet finner en feil ved servervalidering sertifikatet ved å undersøke den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>egenskapen ble sendt til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler>delegere.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A> property does not have any effect on a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>har ingen innvirkning et <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>kall.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To send mail and block while it is transmitted to the SMTP server, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende e-post og blokkerer mens de er overført til SMTP-serveren ved bruk av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A> property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>er satt til `true`, og SMTP-serveren ikke Presenter STARTTLS som svar på EHLO kommando, deretter et kall til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoder vil throw <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sends an e-mail message to an SMTP server for delivery.
trans-unit.target: Sender en e-postmelding til et SMTP-serveren for levering.

trans-unit.source: The message sender, recipients, subject, and message body are specified using <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den avsender mottakere, emne og meldingsteksten angis ved hjelp av <xref:System.String>objekter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method does not block the calling thread and allows the caller to pass an object to the method that is invoked when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer ikke kall tråden, og gjør oppkalleren til å sende et objekt til metoden som aktiveres når operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification when the e-mail has been sent or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Legg til en hendelsesbehandling til å bli varslet når e-postmeldingen er sendt eller operasjonen ble avbrutt, den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> operation by calling the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>operasjonen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>, you must wait for the e-mail transmission to complete before attempting to send another e-mail message using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Etter å <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>, må du vente på at e-overføringen skal fullføres før du prøver å en annen e-postmelding ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> properties must be set either through the configuration files or by setting the properties or passing this information into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne metoden den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>og <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A>Egenskaper må settes til konfigurasjonsfilene eller ved å angi egenskapene eller sende denne informasjonen til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SMTP host requires credentials, you must set them before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SMTP-verten krever legitimasjon, må du konfigurere dem før du kaller opp denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: To specify credentials, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å angi legitimasjon, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception, check the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property to find the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>unntak, kontroll av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>til å finne årsaken operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> can also contain an inner exception that indicates the reason the operation failed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>kan også inneholde en indre unntak som angir årsak operasjonen mislyktes.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>

trans-unit.source: When sending e-mail using <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> to multiple recipients, if the SMTP server accepts some recipients as valid and rejects others, a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> is thrown with a <xref:System.NullReferenceException> for the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Når du sender e-post ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>til flere mottakere, hvis SMTP-serveren godtar noen mottakere som gyldig og avviser andre, en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>returnert med en <xref:System.NullReferenceException>for det interne unntaket.</xref:System.NullReferenceException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> fails to send e-mail to any of the recipients.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette skjer, <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>kan ikke sende e-post til noen av mottakerne.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Your application can detect a server certificate validation error by examining the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property passed into the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Programmet finner en feil ved servervalidering sertifikatet ved å undersøke den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>egenskapen ble sendt til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler>delegere.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A> property does not have any effect on a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>har ingen innvirkning et <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>kall.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To send mail and block while it is transmitted to the SMTP server, use one of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende e-post og blokkerer mens de er overført til SMTP-serveren ved bruk av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A> property is set to `true`, and the SMTP mail server does not advertise STARTTLS in the response to the EHLO command, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>er satt til `true`, og SMTP-serveren ikke Presenter STARTTLS som svar på EHLO kommando, deretter et kall til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoder vil throw <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.EnableSsl%2A>

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder den informasjon om av avsenderen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous operation to send an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter en asynkron operasjon for å sende en e-postmelding.

trans-unit.source: Use the SendAsyncCancel method to cancel a pending <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden SendAsyncCancel for å avbryte en ventende <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>operasjonen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is mail waiting to be sent, this method releases resources used to store the mail.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er venter på å bli sendt e-post, frigir denne metoden ressursene som brukes til å lagre e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: If there is no mail waiting to be sent, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen e-post som venter på å bli sendt, støtter denne metoden ingenting.

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous e-mail send operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en asynkron e sendeoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The SendCompleted event is raised each time an e-mail message is sent asynchronously when the send operation completes.
trans-unit.target: SendCompleted denne hendelsen oppstår hver gang en e-postmeldingen sendes asynkront når sendeoperasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To send an e-mail message asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende en e-postmelding asynkront ved bruk av <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler> is the delegate for SendCompleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler>er representanten for SendCompleted.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> class provides the event handler with event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>klassen gir hendelsesbehandlingen med Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to an SMTP server for delivery as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Sender meldingen angitt til et SMTP-serveren for levering som en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: Denne operasjonen blokkere ikke.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>> object will complete once the message has been sent.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>> objektet fullfører når meldingen er sendt.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailMessage"></xref> that contains the message to send.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.Mail.MailMessage"> </xref> som inneholder å sende meldingen.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Oppgaveobjektet som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.target: Sender meldingen angitt til et SMTP-serveren for levering som en asynkron operasjon.

trans-unit.source: The message sender, recipients, subject, and message body are specified using <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den avsender mottakere, emne og meldingsteksten angis ved hjelp av <xref:System.String>objekter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the network connection used to transmit the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter nettverkstilkoblingen brukes til å sende e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: The settings for the ServicePoint property are created using defaults specified in the application or machine configuration files and the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingene for egenskapen ServicePoint opprettes ved hjelp av standarder som er angitt i programmet eller datamaskinen konfigurasjonsfiler og <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>klasse.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> that connects to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*> property used for SMTP.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> som kobles til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*>egenskapen som benyttes for SMTP.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or the empty string (""). -or- <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port*> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <>*> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller en tom streng (""). -or- <>*> is zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) to use for authentication when using extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir leverandøren navnet SPN (Service) til bruk ved godkjenning ved Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: The TargetName property is used with integrated Windows authentication when an application is using extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen målnavn brukes sammen med integrert Windows-godkjenning ved et program er Utvidet beskyttelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> can then provide extended protection to ensure that credential challenge responses contain service specific information (a SPN) and, if necessary, channel specific information (a channel binding token or CBT).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>så kan levere Utvidet beskyttelse slik at legitimasjon utfordring svar inneholder spesifikk informasjon om (et SPN) og eventuelt kanalen spesifikk informasjon (et token for binding av kanalen eller CBT).</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>

trans-unit.source: With this information in the credential exchanges, services are able to better protect against malicious use of credential challenge responses that might have been improperly obtained.
trans-unit.target: Med denne informasjonen i legitimasjon utvekslinger kan services bedre beskyttelse mot skadelig bruk av legitimasjon utfordring svar som kan ha blitt er hentet.

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property can also be set in a machine or application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen kan også angis i en maskin eller programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: Any changes made to the TargetName property override the configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Endringer som gjøres i egenskapen målnavn overstyre filen konfigurasjonsinnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the SPN to use for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som angir SPN skal brukes for Utvidet beskyttelse.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this SPN is of the form "SMTPSVC/<host>" where <host> is the hostname of the SMTP mail server.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for SPN er i formatet "SMTPSVC /<vert>" der <vert> er det angitte vertsnavnet for SMTP-serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the amount of time after which a synchronous <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*> call times out.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvor lang tid før en synkron <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*>kall blir tidsavbrutt.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*>

trans-unit.source: By default, calls to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> method block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kall til den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>metoden blokk før operasjonen er fullført.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Timeout property to a positive value, and a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A> operation cannot complete in the allotted time, the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class throws an <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter Timeout-egenskapen til en positiv verdi, og en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>kan ikke fullføre i den tillatte tiden, i <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient>klasse kaster en <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>unntak.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: To send a message and continue executing in the application thread, use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende en melding og fortsette å kjøre i tråden programmet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the time-out value in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir Tidsavbruddverdien i millisekunder.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 100,000 (100 seconds).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 100 000 (100 sekunder).

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation was less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt for en set-operasjon er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property when an email is being sent.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre verdien for denne egenskapen når sendes en e-post.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls whether the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*> are sent with requests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som kontrollerer om den <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*>sendes med forespørsler.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default credentials are used; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du er i bruk av standardlegitimasjon. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property when an e-mail is being sent.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre verdien for denne egenskapen når sendes en e-post.
